name: Bacterials And Virums
description:
SOFT LAUNCHED! Version 1.0 available 26th of April. :)

A mad scientist wants to take over the world!

Help her train her Bacterials and Virums in the Boot-camp Beaker so they get strong enough destroy all vaccines!

Contains ads and micro transactions that will feed our family! 

Project currently in progress! We will keep updating it with new exiting characters! 

Follow us on Twitter for updates: @DieYoungStudios (or do it in-game to unlock a character...)
